oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Medical examination report
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Medical examination report for the discharge of T. H. Freeman. After examination by Jno. Gleaves, Surgeon for the 45th Tennessee Volunteers, Freeman was found "incapable of performing the duties of his office." Freeman suffered from a "protracted case of typhoid pneumonia" along with other ailments.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
